data.message: I prohibited my children and all family from listing to this racebatind negative stereotyping  terroristic anti Christian liberal garbage it's time for conservatives to rise against this satanic hate monger of garbage u call music.  Eminem is a Oreo there is no art in rhyming garbage .i teach my kids to take pride in being Mexican culture morals values hopes and dreams .rap music is nothing like that .i teach my kids there's more to life than rap garbage bouncing a ball or running when one is thrown .blacks are oppressed by their own mentality for hate of white people and anyone that has more than them .in California we Mexicans keep pushing balck out of their ghetto and making it livable and decent ,conservative right wing Christian is stoping the left liberal gay loving racebating disease that blacks contribute censorship and the fall of our country to what they call changing times it's over we won TRUMP 2016 and 2020
